1.name: wordpress/admin-css-mu
1.description:
Loads a CSS stylesheet for the WordPress Admin. Can be used with WordPress single install and WordPress multisites. To use this as a must use (mu) plugin, read the installation instructions.

There is no admin interface or fancy code.

Note: The custom css file have to be moved to wp-content/themes/ folder and named custom_admin.css. A sample is provided in the download.
